transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji awaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan ji boliye. Aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan maine sir abhi baat kari team se wo yahi bol rahe hain ki hum aise scenario mein refund nahi karte hain sir. Ye aap choose kar lijiye agar aapko ye nahi karna to aap isme koi aur apna GST jo product hai wo add kara sakte ho kyunki aap GST to mana hi kar rahe ho close karne ke liye. To koi aur product agar isme hai wo kara sakte ho but aise refund nahi hota sir hamare yahan se till the time GST cancel nahi hota hai sir.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji. To
Executive: So I'm so sorry but haan aap bolo sir.
Customer: Paise jo ho jayega wo to pura jo maine paise diye hain wo. Sir please see main ek request aapse ye karna chahungi ki aap jo bhi business kar rahe ho ya inhi ko bol do na apne chacha ko hi ki tu aap hi dekh lo.
Customer: Nahi mam itna nahi hota hai wo itna engagement thodi hai hamara unke sath.
Executive: Sir itne saal ki company hai 1992 mein start hui thi, right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ab 1992 se ekdam se to unhone aake bola nahi hoga sir ke band kar do.
Executive: Ab ye bhi to socho na sir.
Customer: Ye mam internal matter hai wo jo bhi kiya hai wo papa aur chacha ne kiya hai.
Executive: Theek hai koi baat nahi sir I understand lekin sir jo cheez hai dekho main ab wahi bolungi na sir. Ye policy ke against hai.
Customer: Main aapko bata raha hu ki mere to paise kharab jayenge ab agar aap nahi karoge.
Executive: Sir I'm so sorry us cheez ke liye. Main kya hi bolu sir main khud job karti hu sir yahan. Mere ghar ki company hoti to ek bar ki chalo ye hai ki chalo kar dete.
Customer: Ji mam main aapko batata hu jisne ye subscription dilwai thi na maine unko bola bhi tha ki mere ko per month hi karwa do aap. Unhone mere ko ye bol bol ke annual karwa diya.
Executive: Sir aap unko ya unko ek bar call karo wo kya bolta hai dekho.
Customer: Wo unka number possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: Gagandeep hai aapko pata hoga Gagandeep ko.
Executive: I'm so sorry sir us cheez ke liye but please aap dekh hi lijiye sir.
Customer: Nahi isme dekhna kya hai wo to paise kharab jayenge wo to kya hi hoga isme.
Executive: I'm so sorry sir us cheez ke liye main kya kar sakti hu. Ab half karwa do. Kyunki ab isse do mahine hue hain aap half payment karwa do.
Executive: Kahan do mahine hue sir teen mahine ho gaye August mein chala tha.
Customer: Phone disconnect kar diya.
Customer: To teen mahine hue hain abhi bhi teen mahine thodi na honge.
Executive: Sir baat alag hai meri baat bilkul sahi hai. Sir aapko lag sir ek baat batao mere account mein paise nahi dale na mere account se jayenge pehla point. Dusra point mujhe kya milega aapka paisa rokne se aap mujhe ye batao.
Executive: Mere ko to jabhi to maine aapse time liya ki theek hai chalo main baat karti hu fir bhi. But maine unse baat kari unhone saaf mana kar diya tha ki nahi aise hum kisi ke us pe nahi dete hain.
Executive: I'm sorry sir us cheez ke liye.
Customer: Na to unhone mere ko bataya tha. Aur aap dekh lijiye.
Customer: Ye bhi bataya ki refund nahi hota hai.
Executive: Nahi sir wo baat theek hai but trust me agar kuch bhi hota main definitely is cheez ko batati sir aapko but mere pass hai nahi sir sach mein.
Customer: Aur aapki team wale to mere ko bol hi rahe the kab se ki ho jayega ho jayega fir wo wo mere ko mahine mein itna mahine mein maine baat ki.
Executive: Sir wo mujhe pata hai kyunki dekho sir main aapko batati hu mujhe ye cheez pehle pata chalti na to main isko pehle din hi refund kara deti August mein sir. Sach bata rahi hu main kyunki us time pe recently account aaya tha. Lekin ab main nahi kar paungi sir ab wo mujh pe hi question karenge ki client ne August mein kyun tumne host hi kyun kiya.
Executive: Ab ye host bhi ho gaya hai sir aapne kyun karaya aapko bhi to pata hoga na sir teen mahine pehle nahi pata tha ki wo trademark apna mang lenge wapis humse.
Customer: To pata hota to kyun karwate sir.
Executive: Dekho jo cheez hai aapko main isme kuch nahi kar paungi. So sorry us cheez ke liye.
Customer: Aap apne senior se baat karwa do na ek bar.
Executive: Kar ke aayi hu sir aapko kya lagta hai main baat nahi kar ke aaungi unse main kar ke aayi hu.
Customer: Nahi fir main isliye aapko call back kar rahi hu.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir jaise aapko theek lagta hai waise. Are sir main keh to rahi hu main Muskan ki manager baat kar rahi hu sir. Aapko agar mere bhi senior se baat karni hai to sir main unse baat kar ke aayi hu. Wo baat nahi karte hain kisi se. But still aap bol rahe ho to main unko bol dungi wo aapse baat kar lenge but still hum refund nahi kar sakte hain.
Customer: Aap unko yahi bolna ke dekho abhi do din bhi nahi hue hain unka sara paisa waste jayega ye baat agar.
Executive: Sir maine aapko kya lagta hai nahi bataya hoga. Main sari cheez bata ke aayi hu sir.

Executive: Aur sir company ke andar wo jitna client ko bolna chahti hu na client nahi samajhta mera. Agar hota main definitely karwa deti sir.
Customer: Main aapko ye agar aapka subscription model hai theek hai agar subscription cancel karte hain wo jitne mahine wo bache hote hain wo to aap refund kar wo to normal hai.
Executive: Sir wo kar dete hain but wo scenario aise refund nahi karte sir kuch hota hai. Main aapko dobara bol rahi hu sir wo scenario hota hai.
Executive: Aise refund nahi hota.
Executive: Please try to understand sir.
Customer: Ye to fir wahi wali hai ye to.
Customer: Fold hi aapke system mein bhi to. It's kuch main to lootne wali baat hai bas aur kya bolu main.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, gst, policy
